channel.title: [PI] 317 Need Tut on How to add Items (No Model Folder)
channel.description:
Dear Moparscape Users/Helpers, So here's the problem I have this server I'm making I'm new to the RSPS creation so I was going to follow the tutorial here [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html[/url] but... I do not have this "Models" folder in my client! I added one, then I went in and followed the tutorial got to my server typed "Add Model" it opened up a box it says type model ID so I did then once I did it said there was none found. So then I gave up and here I am asking for help please do not redirect me to another tutorial! I am not a dunce I can use google actually, explain to me how to successfully do this. If you cannot please PM with you AIM/Skype and lets screen share or use Team Viewer and help me set it up.
Thanks! Merk

item.title: [PI] 317 Need Tut on How to add Items (No Model Folder)
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

The folder should be called “Raw” not “Models.” You obviously can’t use google vary well.

http://www.run3lcus.com/forums/showthread.php?47135-PI-How-to-add-Customs

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] 317 Need Tut on How to add Items (No Model Folder)

Dear Moparscape Users/Helpers,
So here’s the problem I have this server I’m making I’m new to the RSPS creation so I was going to follow the tutorial here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html but… I do not have this “Models” folder in my client!
